title: Average ticket price Chicago Blackhawks ( NHL ) 2014/15
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2011/12, and lastly slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011/12 and 2012/13.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 62.88 was reached at Year 2012/13
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 55.39 was reported at Year 2010/11
